TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: This class represents all of the settings which must be specified to start a build.

span.span: This class represents all of the settings which must be specified to start a build.

span.span: Creates build parameters.

summary.span: Creates a clone of this build parameters object.

span.span: Creates a clone of this build parameters object.

span.span: Returns a clone of this build parameters object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diese Methode erstellt einen Klon der Protokollierung Auflistungen, aber die Protokollierungen innerhalb tief nicht geklont werden.This method creates a clone of the logger collections, but does not deeply clone the loggers within.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ HostServices { Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a service that allows the host to provide additional control over the build process.

span.span: Gets or sets a service that allows the host to provide additional control over the build process.

value.span: Gibt den Hostdienst zurück.

span.span: Returns the host service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool LegacyThreadingSemantics { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics.

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics.

value.span: Gibt einen Schalter an, der aktiviert oder deaktiviert die legacy-threading-Semantik. "true", wenn aktiviert, andernfalls False.

span.span: Returns a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics; true if enabled, false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Legacy-threading Semantik angeben, dass ist eine Übermittlung erstellt werden sollen nur für den prozessinternen Knoten und die Übermittlung synchron ausgeführt wird und alle Anforderungen auf dem Thread, der den Build gestartet, statt einen Thread, der im Besitz der BuildManager erstellt.Legacy threading semantics indicate that if a submission is to be built only on the in-proc node and the submission is executed synchronously, then all of its requests will be built on the thread which invoked the build rather than a thread owned by the BuildManager.

span.span: Returns the collection of loggers to use during the build.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of nodes this build may use.

value.span: Gibt die maximale Anzahl von Knoten, die dieser Build verwenden kann.

span.span: Returns the maximum number of nodes this build may use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MemoryUseLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the amount of memory the build should limit itself to using, in megabytes.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of memory the build should limit itself to using, in megabytes.

value.span: Gibt die Größe des Arbeitsspeichers, der Build selbst beschränken soll, zu verwenden, in Megabyte an.

span.span: Returns the amount of memory the build should limit itself to using, in megabytes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NodeExeLocation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the build node executable.

value.span: Gibt den Speicherort des Buildknotens ausführbaren Datei zurück.

span.span: Returns the location of the build node executable.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OnlyLogCriticalEvents { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if non-critical logging events should be discarded.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if non-critical logging events should be discarded.

value.span: Gibt ein Flag, das bestimmt, ob unkritische Protokollierungsereignisse verworfen werden sollen.

span.span: Returns a flag that determines if non-critical logging events should be discarded.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ResetCaches { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the build should reset the configuration and results caches.

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the build should reset the configuration and results caches.

value.span: Gibt einen Schalter an, der angibt, ob der Build die Konfiguration und die Ergebnisse Caches zurückgesetzt werden muss. True, wenn die Caches zurückgesetzt werden soll, "false" andernfalls.

span.span: Returns a switch that specifies whether the build should reset the configuration and results caches; true if the caches should be reset, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SaveOperatingEnvironment { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a switch specifying if the operating environment, such as the current directory and environment, should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations.

span.span: Gets or sets a switch specifying if the operating environment, such as the current directory and environment, should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations.

value.span: Gibt einen Switch, der angibt, ob die betriebsumgebung gespeichert und zwischen Projektbuilds und Task-Aufrufe wiederhergestellt werden soll. "true", wenn die Umgebung, "false" andernfalls gespeichert werden soll.

span.span: Returns a switch indicating whether the operating environment should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations; true if the environment should be saved, false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dies sollte auf "false" für alle anderen Build-Manager im System ausgeführt werden, damit wir nicht zwei Build-Manager des jeweils anderen beeinflussen Umgebung verfügen festgelegt werden.This should be set to false for any other build managers running in the system so that we do not have two build managers trampling on each others environment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShutdownInProcNodeOnBuildFinish { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the flag determining whether to shut down the in process node when the build finishes.

span.span: Gets or sets the flag determining whether to shut down the in process node when the build finishes.

summary.span: The default is .

span.span: The default is .

value.span: Gibt das Flag zurück.

span.span: Returns the flag.

summary.span: Gets all of the toolsets.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ UICulture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the UI culture to use during the build.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the UI culture to use during the build.

value.span: Gibt den Namen der UI-Kultur, die während des Builds verwendet.

span.span: Returns the name of the UI culture to use during the build.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSynchronousLogging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process.

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process.

value.span: Gibt einen Schalter an, der angibt, ob die synchrone Protokollierung verwendet wird, wenn nur ein einzelner Prozess vorhanden ist. Bei "true", verwenden Sie die synchrone Protokollierung, verwenden Sie andernfalls asynchrone Protokollierung.

span.span: Returns a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process; if true, use synchronous logging, otherwise use asynchronous logging.
